name: @pcircle/footprint
description: MCP server for Footprint - automatic audit trails and encrypted footprints for AI conversations
author: PCIRCLE, LLC

scripts.build:ui: mkdir -p dist/ui && pnpm build:ui:dashboard && pnpm build:ui:detail && pnpm build:ui:export
scripts.build:ui:dashboard: cross-env INPUT=ui/dashboard.html vite build --outDir dist/ui-tmp && cp dist/ui-tmp/ui/dashboard.html dist/ui/dashboard.html
scripts.build:ui:detail: cross-env INPUT=ui/detail.html vite build --outDir dist/ui-tmp && cp dist/ui-tmp/ui/detail.html dist/ui/detail.html
scripts.build:ui:export: cross-env INPUT=ui/export.html vite build --outDir dist/ui-tmp && cp dist/ui-tmp/ui/export.html dist/ui/export.html
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm test:run
